title: In Vivo Efficacy and Toxicity Study (Real , Physical Lab Test No Literature or Simulated Data)
description:
We have discovered a first-in-class small molecule inhibitor targeting GOT1 (Glutamic-Oxaloacetic Transaminase 1), which plays a key role in glutamine metabolism, NADPH homeostasis, and cancer cell survival, especially in pancreatic and colorectal cancers.

We are now seeking a qualified and experienced research partner to conduct a full in vivo proof-of-concept (POC) study, including efficacy and toxicity testing in mice.


Objectives of This Study:

1. Assess the anti-tumor efficacy of our GOT1 inhibitor in a relevant mouse cancer model.


2. Determine toxicity profile — including tolerability, weight change, and basic organ function data.


3. Deliver interpretable, high-quality data that can be included in a pitch to pharmaceutical companies.

title: Skilled IT Services Salesperson Needed
description:
I'm looking for experienced IT services salespeople. I have 15 chats with leads per week in English (and occasionally in Spanish), and I'm looking to close sales. We're a company with over 20 years of experience and clients in India, the USA, Spain, Brazil, and Latin America (we speak Spanish, English, and Portuguese). Projects typically range from USD 3,000 to USD 10,000. I'm offering the following:

+ USD 120 monthly base payment for the leads we provide (usually 3 leads per day, handled via chat).

title: Auto-Reply Android App Development
description:
I'm seeking a ready-made Android application that can automatically send SMS or WhatsApp messages when a call is missed or received. 

The app should ideally include the following features (or be customizable to add them later):
- Auto-reply via SMS and/or WhatsApp

- Option to enable/disable auto-reply
- Customizable auto-reply messages
- Option to customize auto-reply messages for different contacts
- Call log with auto-replied records
- Firebase or backend integration for remote message updates (optional)
- Clean UI with Material Design

- List of features
- Technology stack used
- Pricing (with source code)

title: Recreate Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) Report with Custom Data and Graphs (Exact Replica)
description:
Project Description:
I need a skilled freelancer experienced in medical document design and data visualization to recreate a 4-page Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) report. The goal is to replicate the layout, styling, tables, and graphs from my original PFT PDF report exactly, but with updated values that I will provide.

This is not just a redesign, it must match my original report in appearance, structure, colors, fonts, and formatting, including all medical graphs and tables. The final result should be print-ready, in PDF format, and look identical to the original, but using my new clinical data.

What You’ll Do:

Replace all numerical data in tables with my updated values
